extendedInfo.description: A musical toolkit including instruments (grand piano, piano keyboard, drums), tools (metronome, pitch pipe), a game (piano practice), and more...Detailed Features==============================Piano & Keyboard  o Scrolling grand piano  o 2-octave stacked piano  o 8 included MIDI instrumentsPiano Practice Mode  o Play-along piano learning game  o Auto-accompaniment  o Piano scrolls to correct octaves  o Purchase more songs in-appDrums  o Basic 8-piece drum kitMetronome  o 40-200BPM metronome  o Time signatures/subdivisions  o Animated metronome graphicPitch Pipe  o C to CMultitouch (piano/drums)Honeycomb tablet optimizedPaid Upgrade==============================Ad-Supported! Upgrade to Musical Pro for 128 instruments for piano, wireless MIDI piano for PC/Mac, piano recording, and more.

reviews.title: Great but would be nice if...
reviews.comment: I love this app, but it would be nice if when you played MIDI file on it to learn, you could choose between the treble/bass. Also, it recently started to dim the screen and disable the touch capabilities when I try to learn songs via MIDI files. But other than those issues, fantastic! DROID RAZR
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Its a fun musical app! I love making music and showing my sister how good I can play. :-)
reviews.author: Ariana Marquez

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: A great app for on-the-go practicing and pitches. Would give five stars if the highlighted keys had just a little more to offer in landscape.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Magic piano
reviews.comment: Really its a great game my sister who dowloaded this game plays wiirh all the time she  never ends with the game and I dont blame her its a great game! And she knows how to use an samsung galaxy s 3 and  she is only 5 but thats not the point though as I was saying the game is great like its a touch phone piano im telling you the game is great.But dont take my word for it go download the game for yourself and you see what I mean about the game.
reviews.author: stacie clark

reviews.title: Metronome forgets tempo
reviews.comment: This app is great, but there is one thing that has been frustrating me with it: if the metronome is stopped and the phone locks, when I unlock it again the metronome has gone back to 40 bpm. Any chance of a fix? Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashing
reviews.comment: I have an Asus Prime with Jelly Bean.  This app crashes out after about 30secs of use - its of no use to me
reviews.author: geoff moritimer

reviews.title: Keyboards don\'t work on new gs4
reviews.comment: Worked great on previous samsung phone but not the new gs 4. Not really usable w/o Keybrds working. There\'s haptic feedback, but no sounds.
reviews.author: Steven Lee

reviews.title: To Sharon who posted before me...
reviews.comment: Sharon, that \"tock tock\" you talked about is called a \"Metronome\". It keeps tempo. Go into Settings (where you choose your instrument), go into the metronome part, switch it OFF. I\'m betting you have it switched On. Ok? You can use it to keep time (at any tempo) when learning a song. If you don\'t want it, switch it off. Sorted. :) This app\'s pretty good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashing like crazy
reviews.comment: After the latest update, the keyboard crashes after no more then 15 seconds. It used to be exactly what I needed, but now it\'s worthless. Very disappointed.
